message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $980000. It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.

I can see you're really serious about this product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you at $940000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's still a great deal for you, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you at $920000. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I've already met you at $940000 and you countered at $920000. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm going to make one final offer: $930000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
